summary:
A weekly list of interesting things I found on the internet, posted on Sundays.  Sometimes themed, often not. 

1️⃣ What The Verge did last month to look back at the internet’s infancy in 2004 was remarkably fun...
title: 7 Things This Week [#158]

summary:
I’ve see a few people sharing their pet peeves recently, so that to add a few of my own:

It drives me nuts when someone tells you not to break up a relationship over politics.  Honey, let me tell you, if you're compromising your values to suck up to a jerk who votes right-wing conservative, it's time to move countries. 
Sending me a link to go watch a video or listen to music where I have to create an account and or sign in...
title: It's Pet Peeve Time

summary:
I went to FFConf on Friday.  It did me the world of good. 

To be honest, I haven’t much felt like venturing out over the past few days since my optimism took a big hit...
title: FFConf 2024
